content:
Hello,
I'm a newbie and I apologize in advance for any "stupid" questions. I want to use the LOINC answer codes but I get the following error message:

ERROR:The code "LA..." is not valid in the system http://loinc.org; The code provided (http://loinc.org#LA...) is not valid in the value set 'All codes known to the system' (from http://tx.fhir.org/r4) f√ºr "http://loinc.org#LA..."

According to my research, the terminology server should accept the codes. I have already browsed the other topics and have not found anything suitable to my problem.

I ran into the same issue - and suspect it is related to a recent update:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179202-terminology/topic/LOINC.20updated.20to.20version.202.2E71.20on.20tx.2Efhir.2Eorg
